content.question: A polynomial function <math alttext="p"><semantics><mi>p</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses equals negative x open parentheses x minus 4 close parentheses open parentheses x plus 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are all intervals on which <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses greater or equal than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 , 4 close square brackets"><semantics><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2,4</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 , 0 close square brackets union open square brackets 4 comma infinity close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2,0</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>∪</mo><mfenced open="["><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 4 close square brackets union open square brackets 0 , 2 close square brackets"><semantics><mrow><mfenced close="]"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>∪</mo><mfenced close="]" open="["><mn>0,2</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 2 close square brackets union open square brackets 0 , 4 close square brackets"><semantics><mrow><mfenced close="]"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>∪</mo><mfenced close="]" open="["><mn>0,4</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 2 close square brackets union open square brackets 0 , 4 close square brackets"><semantics><mrow><mfenced close="]"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>∪</mo><mfenced close="]" open="["><mn>0,4</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
